title: 整数转罗马数字 (Integer to Roman)
content: 思路: // @Title: 整数转罗马数字 (Integer to Roman) // @Author: qisiii // @Date: 2024-04-11 23:31:56 // @Runtime: 3 ms // @Memory: 43.1 MB // @comment: // @flag: class Solution { public String intToRoman(int num) { int[] ala=new int[]{1000,900,500,400,100,90,50,40,10,9,5,4,1}; String[] lm=new String[]{"M","CM","D","CD","C","XC","L","XL","X","IX","V","IV","I"}; StringBuilder str=new StringBuilder(); for(int i=0;i<ala.length;i++){ //2999 while(num>=ala[i]){ str.append(lm[i]); num=num-ala[i]; } } return str.toString(); } }
